Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 2d10+8 damage, and ongoing 10 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 2d10+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The aspect of Bahamut makes two claw attacks and one bite attack

At-Will

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When an enemy moves into a square adjacent to the aspect of bahamut, at-will

+20 vs Reflex; 2d10+8 damage, and the target is grabbed. First Failed Escape Attempt: The aspect of Bahamut automatically hits the target with its bite attack.

Cold

Standard, Recharge 5

Close blast 5

+20 vs Reflex; 3d12+10 cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Standard, Recharge 5

Close blast 5

+20 vs Fortitude; 3d12+10 damage, and 10 ongoing damage (save ends).

Standard, Recharge 5

Close blast 5

+20 vs Will; Close blast 5; +20 vs. Will; the target is stunned, weakened, and transformed into fine mist (save ends all). While the target is in this mist form, enemies can move through the target's space freely.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The aspect of Bahamut's breath weapon recharges, and it uses polar breath, disintegration breath, or misty breath.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +20 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the aspect of Bahamut's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

system.biography:
HP 704; Bloodied 352 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 20 cold, 20 fire 		Init +11 | AP 2 | Save +5; whenever an attack causes an effect on an aspect of Bahamut that a save can end, it immediately makes a saving throw. The aspect of Bahamut also makes saving throws at the end of its turn as normal.
AC 35Fort 32Ref 29Will 30
Speed 10, fly 10 (hover), teleport 5
Ability ScoresStr 22 (+15)
Con 24 (+16)		Dex 14 (+11)
Int 18 (+13)		Wis 19 (+13)
Cha 20 (+14)
Languages all
Alignment Lawful Good
Skills Arcana +18, Diplomacy +19, History +18, Insight +18, Intimidate +19, Religion +18Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 28

Standard
